question: when did the celebrities enter the big brother house
vanilla_rag_result:
The celebrities entered the Big Brother house on the following dates:

1. In Vietnam, six celebrity housemates entered on July 4, 2016, and the last three entered the next day, July 5, 2016.
2. In the UK, eleven celebrity housemates entered on January 3, 2007.
3. On January 3, 2017, Block entered the "Celebrity Big Brother" house.
4. A group of ten initial housemates entered on August 18, although specific names and details of their entry are provided.
5. On August 22, 2013, Spence entered the "Celebrity Big Brother" house.
